product_name: The North Face Litho Quarter-Zip Wool Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built with dynamic motion and vertical movement in mind, the women's Litho Quarter-Zip wool top from The North Face offers enduring comfort as a base layer or on its own. Lightweight merino wool has exceptional wicking properties and the ability to regulate body temperature; plus, it naturally resists odors. Athletically patterned and close-fitting cut lets you move without restriction and enhances vertical movement. Front zipper ventilates instantly. Easy-to-access zippered pocket at mid torso stores small items. The women's Litho Quarter-Zip top features a no-rise hem that is slightly longer in back. The North Face Summit Series(TM) apparel is designed and tested for use in harsh environments and is harness and pack compatible. Closeout.
short_description: Built with dynamic motion and vertical movement in mind, the women's Litho Quarter-Zip wool top from The North Face offers enduring comfort as a base layer or on its own.
